name: Airplane Landing - Flight Aircraft Tycoon
description:
Cool Graphics
Interesting Sound Effects
Great Time Killer
_________________________
Now you can have the pleasure of landing a plane. A new game ‘Airplane Landing’ is out there for you to practice your airplane landing skills. Land your plane on the runway perfectly to get high score. The one who will land maximum planes in a minute will win. Practice as much as you can to score high points in the game.

You have to balance the plane according the turbulence created by the wind on the plane. Tap left or right according to the turbulence. If you do not control the plane on time, it will crash and you will lose one precious score point. It is a simple yet interesting game.

***Game Feature***

Avoid Crash
Save the Passengers
Score Highest Point
